function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Absence of worker protections such as sick leave and paid time off","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious disease spread in the construction industry due to employees coming to work sick or without proper rest","Mitigation":"Implementing flexible work policies, providing access to healthcare, and promoting a culture of prioritizing health and safety","Technologies":"Health monitoring tools, contact tracing apps, and remote work technology","People":"Construction workers, employees in the construction industry","Owner":"Construction companies, policymakers"},{"Description":"Economic difficulties caused by COVID-19","Impact":"Potential for increased financial stress and desperation leading to risky behavior and disregard for health precautions","Mitigation":"Financial assistance programs, mental health support, and access to affordable healthcare","Technologies":"Online financial support platforms, telemedicine services, and mental health apps","People":"Workers in the construction industry, individuals facing financial hardship","Owner":"Government, financial institutions, healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"New generation (Generation C) emerging due to the pandemic","Impact":"Behavioral changes and societal shifts in the new generation may impact disease propagation patterns and risk perceptions","Mitigation":"Education on health and safety practices, promoting responsible use of technology, and fostering community resilience","Technologies":"Online education platforms, social media monitoring tools, and community engagement apps","People":"Young individuals in the new generation, society as a whole","Owner":"Educational institutions, public health organizations, community leaders"}]}
